summary: A documentary on the 25th bombing mission of the Memphis Belle, a B-17 in the US 8th Air Force.
cast: Stanley Wray|Robert Morgan|James A. Verinis|Robert J. Hanson|Charles B. Leighton|Harold P. Loch|John P. Quinlan|Cecil H. Scott|Vince Evans|Clarence E. Winchell|Casimer A. Nastal|Haywood Hansell|King George VI|Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother|Ira C. Eaker|Jacob L. Devers|Art Gilmore|Eugene Kern|Arthur Kennedy
title: The Memphis Belle: A Story of a Flying Fortress
